CatDescriptText: Related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 14, 1961, pg. 11, reads: "Granted D.I. Name - These glamorous ladies, who belong to the victorious faction of the split D.I. Club, Inc., are shown with Judge Clarence B. Nixon, who recently granted them the right to use the name, and Atty. Byrd R. Brown, who waged the successful battle for them in court...Gloria Grate, Nellye Baron, Margaret Watson and Juanita Drake."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Judge Clarence B. Nixon holding document with D.I. Club, Inc. Margaret Watson, with fellow members Nellye Baron, Juanita Drake, and Gloria Golden Grate, and Atty. Byrd R. Brown looking on
